February 1985: The Courier for Hell

Plays:

The Courier for Hell (冥途の飛脚)

Scenes:

The Kameya Express Agency at Awajimachi (淡路町)

The Misappropriation (of Money) (封印切)

The Travel in a Palanquin (道行相合かご)

Characters:

Ihei (手代伊兵衛)

Jinnai (国侍甚内)

Myokan (母妙閑)

Chubei (亀屋忠兵衛)

Man (下女まん)

Hachiemon (丹波屋八右衛門)

Baggage transport manager (宰領)

Supervisor of courtesans (花車)

Courtesan Umegawa (傾城(遊女)梅川)

Courtesan Chiyotose (傾城(遊女)千代歳)

Courtesan Narutose (傾城(遊女)鳴渡瀬)

Girl attendant to a courtesan (禿)

Jester Gohei (太鼓持五兵衛)

Palanquin bearer (駕屋)

Hachiemon's messangers (八右衛門の使)

Rin, a maid (仲居りん)

Tama, a maid (仲居たま)

Horse drivers (馬方)
